title: Housekeeping Post February 2014
summary:
Key ideas:
- The post is a series of updates on different topics
- The first birthday of the blog is celebrated
- The author will be in the Bay Area soon and is interested in attending rationalist community parties or meetups
- The author asked for volunteers to help Ozy with their thesis on romance novels
- The author requests remote access information to be able to read medical and psychological articles

Key learnings:
- The blog is at least one year old
- The author is looking for opportunities to meet people in person
- The author is interested in discussing medical and psychological research on their blog
- The author is conducting a survey on nootropics

Key questions:
- Does anyone know the social schedule for rationalist community parties or meetups in the Bay Area during March 1 to 16?
- Is there anything sufficiently interesting going on March 14 or 15 that would require the author to stay longer in the Bay Area?
- Does anyone have remote access to university libraries to lend to the author?
- Will anyone be willing to take the author's survey on nootropics?
